actions.name: Psychic Burst
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Spell Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 13 (3d6+3) psychic damage.

special_abilities.name: Intuition
special_abilities.desc: The wyrdling rolls two dice for initiative, taking the higher number. In addition, the wyrdling has advantage on WIS (Insight) checks.

special_abilities.name: Read Fate
special_abilities.desc: The wyrdling can spend 1 minute communing with fate on behalf of one creature that remains within 10 feet of it for the duration. The creature must ask a single question concerning a specific goal, event, or activity to occur within 7 days. At the end of the minute, the wyrdling pronounces the result of the target's inquiry. This trait works like the divination spell, except it can't be used to answer a specific creature's question more than once every 3 days, regardless if the creature asks a different question.
